page.title: 05Games We Play
page.content: As a result of a questionnaire,it was established that the variety of games differed with the age and sex of the child.A seven year old girl played games like skipping,leap frog,hop scotch in the garden or playground. The boys of the same age played Tap it,Chase and Conkers.Many of the games mimicked heroes seen on television e.g. Star Trek,A Team,Robin Hood,Star Wars and Knight Rider.Both boys and girls played team games like "Please Jack may we cross the water","In and out of the Scottish bluebells","The Farmer's in the den".These involved singing rhymes played while dancing or skipping in a ring.The games played at home were of a commercial nature,snakes and ladders,ludo,Connect 4 and Monopoly were the most popular with the seven year old boys and girls.
